name: 12 Days of Christmas Vino
description:
Play this holiday game to see wine recommendations based on your choices in the "12 Days of Christmas Vino" brought to you by Telesomm and Zoe Wilkins.

Note: Kinda works on mobile - prettier on a real computer

What is Telesomm?
The Telesomm app  connects wine lovers with wine professionals for custom wine experiences, from the comfort of home. We're changing the way people connect, share, and discover wine.

Credit:
Script: Zoe Wilkins
Game design: Vanessa Raymond
Audio: freesounds.org
